feed.title: Solution for blockchain congestion and determination of block size by bitcoin network/protocol itself.

entry.title: Solution for blockchain congestion and determination of block size by bitcoin network/protocol itself.
entry.summary: In this context, the discussion revolves around the purpose of the block size limit. The speaker suggests that a clearer understanding of the purpose will lead to a more productive conversation. However, no further information is provided regarding the proposal or the block size limit itself.
